You gain a +[1] bonus to Initiative rolls. This scales with your Rogue level.

You no longer need Advantage to trigger Sneak Attack if there are no other combatants within [2] of the target or if you have an ally within that range. All the other rules for Sneak Attack still apply to you.

Use your lightning-quick reflexes to protect yourself.

You can use a Reaction to halve incoming damage.

Once per turn, you can deal extra damage when you hit with an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> made with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> or against an enemy standing near your allies. The attack must use a <LSTag Tooltip="Finesse">Finesse</LSTag> or ranged weapon.
Deal <font color="#ffffff">[1] extra damage</font> to the target.
